Book Buddy is an iPhone educational application which will help student with learning disabilities learn to read.

Squire du soleil Annual Report

Squire du soleil Annual Report with handmade illustrations and bright colours

Children at risk is a non for profit organization in Ottawa, Ontario. They work and support children with Autism and their families. The provide access to community resources to improved the lives of the children they work with.
